long_description: Offering durable, wrinkle-resistant fabric, the Kuhl Vertikl shirt handles long trips without ever looking tired or worn out. If only we could look as good after a multi-city adventure. Cotton is blended with Suncel(TM) lyocell fabric; lyocell fabrics have a soft texture and attractive drape, and resist wrinkles. With a UPF 30 rating, fabric provides good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. The Kuhl Vertikl shirt has a left chest pocket and a hidden security pocket. Closeout.
short_description: Offering durable, wrinkle-resistant fabric, the Kuhl Vertikl shirt handles long trips without ever looking tired or worn out. If only we could look as good after a multi-city adventure.
